column5: ADMA stealing

ADMA Just found this out Biotest engaged Raymond James sell 5813954 ADMA shares The sale was completed on June 6 2019 Well RJ was also involved in the recent offering of ADMA shares at 4 pps which closed on May 21 2019 I expect RJ was well aware of the impending Biotest divesture when they ran the May offering Its clear some tute entity is now gobbling up the shares at below May offering price of 4 Just a matter of time before they take it up again

ADMA Patience and self control is what you need to make a lot of money here This thing is set up as well as possible for a biotech most major unknowns removed no FDA problems sales imminent and stock temporarily depressed due to no problem of the companys

ADMA The companys story has changed fundamentally in recent months Before May it was a developmental biotech stock with a share price and valuation driven by speculation around binary approval events With the key approvals achieved it is now an execution story The stock may take a while to adjust to this new reality Or will it6 in two weeks
ADMA should be easy for Raymond James to handle buyers and sellers here after their recent involvement with the offering

ADMA The truth of the matter is that the FDA is the controlling entity of this entity Their directive is for approval only But FDA is the puppet master behind this one That explains a lot of the actionsaction going on and aa lot more coming This is why Managenent is totally hush hush The FDA is using ADMA along with its flagship products a d related patents to integrate with another company I wont say the name to flagship ADMAs products along with otherlabel and mostly off label uses Unfortunately Biotest has to go in the FDA decided fast and now This is all happening because we are at a crisis because of supply of p i v e g type products
